startup.apis:
Select which store features you would like to use, hover for more details.
Certain store features may not be disabled.
startup.catalog:
Your browser may prompt you for storage permissions. PSDLE will use this to store Catalog responses for quicker and automatic startup.

Granting permission is only required for these benefits.

If you run into issues or would like to you can revoke the persmission and clear the cache below the Start button.

aria.start: Start P S D L E
aria.mainScreen: P S D L E $SCREEN$ screen

strings.noTarget: There is no available target console to send to.

apis.name: Purchase History
apis.desc: Cannot be disabled. Uses your purchase history to create the download list and determine PlayStation Plus status.

apis.name: Catalog
apis.desc: Enable for additional game information, including categories. Increases time needed to create the download list.

apis.name: Download Queue
apis.desc: Allows adding and removing items from the download queue. Reads download queue information and console activation status.

apis.name: PS TV
apis.desc: Detect PS TV compatible titles. Only supported on "en-us" web store (not PSDLE language).
